experience.title: Experience

experience.description-1: Solid IT experience over 12 years as a Full Stack Developer, Data Analysis, and technical support for infrastructure and systems. Combining deep technical knowledge with a strategic business vision, enabling the delivery of solutions that truly impact company results.
experience.description-2: Responsible for the development and maintenance of web systems, requirements analysis, and implementation of scalable solutions. Provided technical leadership in projects to modernize legacy systems.
experience.description-3: Development of web applications using modern technologies. Actively participated in all phases of development, from conception to deployment and maintenance.
